# Results

```{r oddsratio, echo = FALSE}

conversation_long$label_CDC <- relevel(conversation_long$label_CDC, ref = "Public-Health")
conversation_long$label_Reply <- relevel(conversation_long$label_Reply, ref = "Public-Health")

oddsratio <- exp(coef(mlr)) %>%
  as.data.frame()
names <-
  c(
    "Intercept",
    "Big-Pharma",
    "COVID-Outbreaks",
    "COVID-Testing",
    "Government-Skeptic",
    "Sanitation",
    "Masks",
    "Distancing",
    "US-Cases",
    "Vaccine-Effects",
    "Vaccine-Skeptic"
  )
# colnames(oddsratio) <-  c("Intercept", mlr[["lab"]][-1])
colnames(oddsratio) <- names
oddskable <- knitr::kable(
  oddsratio,
  format = "latex",
  digits = 4,
  caption = "Odds Ratios: Reply Topic per CDC Topic",
  booktabs = T
) %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("repeat_header",
                                  "scale_down",
                                  "hold_position"),
                font_size = 10) %>%
  add_footnote(notation = "number",
               label = c("CDC Topics by Row; Reply Topics by Column", "Note: 'Public-Health' is absent as it is the baseline for MLR analysis.")) #%>% 
  # landscape()
oddskable
```
